com.mlt.desktop

Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.Option

  • public class Option
extends java.lang.Object
    Packs the attributes of an button or menu item option, like the optional action, the text, the tooltip, etc.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Option.Group
      Option groups are used to group options.

      • option

        public static Option option(java.lang.String key,
                            java.lang.String text,
                            java.lang.String toolTip,
                            javax.swing.KeyStroke accelerator,
                            boolean defaultClose,
                            boolean closeWindow)
        Create an option.
        Parameters:
        key - Key.
        text - Text.
        toolTip - Tool tip.
        accelerator - Accelerator key.
        defaultOption - Default option.
        defaultClose - Default close.
        closeWindow - Close window.
        Returns:
        The option.

      • setMnemonics

        public static void setMnemonics(java.util.List<? extends Option> options)
        Sets the mnemonics for a list of option buttons and menu items if present. Starts with the first character of the text, and if the mnemonic is used, scans the text for the first character not used.
        Parameters:
        options - The list of options to set the mnemonics.

      • setMnemonics

        public static void setMnemonics(Option... options)
        Sets the mnemonics for a list of option buttons and menu items if present. Starts with the first character of the text, and if the mnemonic is used, scans the text for the first character not used.
        Parameters:
        options - The list of options to set the mnemonics.

      • setMnemonics

        public static void setMnemonics(Button... buttons)
        Sets the mnemonics for a list of option buttons and menu items if present. Starts with the first character of the text, and if the mnemonic is used, scans the text for the first character not used.
        Parameters:
        options - The list of options to set the mnemonics.

      • setMnemonics

        public static void setMnemonics(MenuItem... menuItems)
        Sets the mnemonics for a list of option buttons and menu items if present. Starts with the first character of the text, and if the mnemonic is used, scans the text for the first character not used.
        Parameters:
        options - The list of options to set the mnemonics.
